attributes.action: Allow the use of "Bus Only" lanes by scooters and motorcyles throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow motorcycles and Scooters to use bus lanes without penalty at any time.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow the use of "Bus Only" lanes by scooters and motorcyles throughout the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12861.asp

Prime Minister's Office
